languages.text: {n}На первый взгляд мужчина перед вами не производит впечатление великого умника — рвать и убивать ему явно привычнее, чем думать. Но во взгляде его вы замечаете проницательную остроту. Осмотрев вас, он кратко отвечает:{/n} "Я — Волк".

{n}At first glance, the man does not strike you as possessing great intellect — he is clearly more accustomed to mauling and killing than thinking. But you detect a certain shrewdness in his eyes. After looking you over, he says shortly,{/n} "I am a Wolf."
languages.original_text: {n}На первый взгляд мужчина перед вами не производит впечатление великого умника — рвать и убивать ему явно привычнее, чем думать. Но во взгляде его вы замечаете проницательную остроту. Осмотрев вас, он кратко отвечает:{/n} "Я — Волк".

traits.locale_text: {n}At first glance, the man does not strike you as possessing great intellect — he is clearly more accustomed to mauling and killing than thinking. But you detect a certain shrewdness in his eyes. After looking you over, he says shortly,{/n} "I am a Wolf."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}At first glance, the man does not strike you as possessing great intellect — he is clearly more accustomed to mauling and killing than thinking. But you detect a certain shrewdness in his eyes. After looking you over, he says shortly,{/n} "I am a Wolf."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}At first glance, the man does not strike you as possessing great intellect — he is clearly more accustomed to mauling and killing than thinking. But you detect a certain shrewdness in his eyes. After looking you over, he says shortly,{/n} "I am a Wolf."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}At first glance, the man does not strike you as possessing great intellect — he is clearly more accustomed to mauling and killing than thinking. But you detect a certain shrewdness in his eyes. After looking you over, he says shortly,{/n} "I am a Wolf."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}乍看之下，这个人的头脑似乎不怎么好用。他看起来更习惯于打打杀杀，而不是动脑子。但随后，你就在他的眼神中觉察到了精明的神色。他看了看你，简短地说了一句。{/n}“我是一头狼。”
languages.original_text: {n}At first glance, the man does not strike you as possessing great intellect — he is clearly more accustomed to mauling and killing than thinking. But you detect a certain shrewdness in his eyes. After looking you over, he says shortly,{/n} "I am a Wolf."

traits.locale_text: {n}乍看之下，这个人的头脑似乎不怎么好用。他看起来更习惯于打打杀杀，而不是动脑子。但随后，你就在他的眼神中觉察到了精明的神色。他看了看你，简短地说了一句。{/n}“我是一头狼。”
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}外見上、この男が優れた知性を持っているようには見えない。考えることより殴ったり殺したりすることに長けていそうだ。しかし、彼の目にある種の抜け目のなさを感じる。こちらをよく見た後、彼は短くこう言った。{/n}「狼だ」
languages.original_text: {n}At first glance, the man does not strike you as possessing great intellect — he is clearly more accustomed to mauling and killing than thinking. But you detect a certain shrewdness in his eyes. After looking you over, he says shortly,{/n} "I am a Wolf."

traits.locale_text: {n}外見上、この男が優れた知性を持っているようには見えない。考えることより殴ったり殺したりすることに長けていそうだ。しかし、彼の目にある種の抜け目のなさを感じる。こちらをよく見た後、彼は短くこう言った。{/n}「狼だ」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}A primera vista, el hombre no parece dotado de un gran intelecto. Está más acostumbrado a matar y devorar que a pensar. Sin embargo, ves cierta astucia en su mirada. Tras mirarte de arriba abajo, responde con brevedad:{/n} «Soy un Lobo».
languages.original_text: {n}At first glance, the man does not strike you as possessing great intellect — he is clearly more accustomed to mauling and killing than thinking. But you detect a certain shrewdness in his eyes. After looking you over, he says shortly,{/n} "I am a Wolf."

traits.locale_text: {n}A primera vista, el hombre no parece dotado de un gran intelecto. Está más acostumbrado a matar y devorar que a pensar. Sin embargo, ves cierta astucia en su mirada. Tras mirarte de arriba abajo, responde con brevedad:{/n} «Soy un Lobo».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}À première vue, l'homme n'a pas l'air d'être doté d'un grand intellect. Il semble plus habitué à massacrer qu'à réfléchir. Malgré tout, vous décelez une certaine finesse d'esprit dans ses yeux lorsqu'il vous examine du regard avant de répondre, laconiquement :{/n} « Je suis un Loup. »
languages.original_text: {n}At first glance, the man does not strike you as possessing great intellect — he is clearly more accustomed to mauling and killing than thinking. But you detect a certain shrewdness in his eyes. After looking you over, he says shortly,{/n} "I am a Wolf."

traits.locale_text: {n}À première vue, l'homme n'a pas l'air d'être doté d'un grand intellect. Il semble plus habitué à massacrer qu'à réfléchir. Malgré tout, vous décelez une certaine finesse d'esprit dans ses yeux lorsqu'il vous examine du regard avant de répondre, laconiquement :{/n} « Je suis un Loup. »
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Auf den ersten Blick scheint der Mann keinen besonderen Intellekt zu haben – Reißen und Töten liegen ihm offenkundig näher als Denken. Aber in seinem Blick bemerkst du eine gewisse Klugheit. Er mustert dich und meint dann knapp:{/n} "Ich bin ein Wolf."
languages.original_text: {n}At first glance, the man does not strike you as possessing great intellect — he is clearly more accustomed to mauling and killing than thinking. But you detect a certain shrewdness in his eyes. After looking you over, he says shortly,{/n} "I am a Wolf."

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf den ersten Blick scheint der Mann keinen besonderen Intellekt zu haben – Reißen und Töten liegen ihm offenkundig näher als Denken. Aber in seinem Blick bemerkst du eine gewisse Klugheit. Er mustert dich und meint dann knapp:{/n} "Ich bin ein Wolf."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.original_text: {n}At first glance, the man does not strike you as possessing great intellect — he is clearly more accustomed to mauling and killing than thinking. But you detect a certain shrewdness in his eyes. After looking you over, he says shortly,{/n} "I am a Wolf."

languages.text: {n}Adsam, ilk bakışta sende çok zekiymiş izlenimi uyandırmıyor. Düşünmekten ziyade hırpalayıp öldürmeye daha aşina olduğu belli oluyor. Ancak gözlerinde şüphesiz bir dirayet seziyorsun. Sana bakmasının hemen ardından konuşuyor.{/n} "Ben bir Kurdum."
languages.original_text: {n}At first glance, the man does not strike you as possessing great intellect — he is clearly more accustomed to mauling and killing than thinking. But you detect a certain shrewdness in his eyes. After looking you over, he says shortly,{/n} "I am a Wolf."

traits.locale_text: {n}İlk bakışta adam sende muhteşem bir zekâya sahipmiş izlenimi uyandırmıyor. Düşünmekten ziyade hırpalayıp öldürmeye daha aşina olduğu çok açık. Ancak gözlerinde şüphesiz bir dirayet seziyorsun. Sana bakmasının hemen ardından konuşuyor.{/n} "Ben bir Kurdum."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
